ygData.subject: Re: Lowest price possible on medium steel
ygData.msgSnippet: ... If it doesn t have a size, it s medium.  Look at the list of races that can use it.  Wood and high elves, halflings, dwarves, and gnomes wear smal.  Wood
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 18 Aug 1999, Llewrend Lynnhaven wrote:
>
> Call me crazy (shouts from the crowd 'YOUR CRAZY') but
> upon further inspection of my bronze, no where on it
> does it have a size, much like blackened iron, which

If it doesn't have a size, it's medium. Look at the list of
races that can use it. Wood and high elves, halflings,
dwarves, and gnomes wear smal. Wood and high levles, half
elves, humans and erudites wear medium. Dunno what dark elves
wear.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
